name: Baguio Pinikpikan
description: Indulge in the hearty and nutritious Baguio Pinikpikan - a high-protein, low-carb, and low-sugar dish that embodies the essence of healthy living. Perfectly tailored for those seeking delicious yet health-conscious options, this recipe transforms traditional ingredients into a modern masterpiece.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your ingredients: Clean the gizzard and chicken livers, separate the egg yolks, cut the free range chicken into serving pieces, and peel and chop the sorakaya (bottle gourd).
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, bring water to a boil and add the chicken pieces. Simmer for 20 minutes to cook the chicken thoroughly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the gizzard and chicken livers to the pot and cook for an additional 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Incorporate the chopped sorakaya into the mix and simmer until the vegetables are tender, about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Carefully remove the pot from the heat, and gently stir in the egg yolks to thicken the broth, ensuring the mix does not come to a boil again.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
